ingredients: ½ cup moong dal, soaked in water for an hour or two hours or overnight
1 medium onion, chopped or ⅓ cup chopped onion
1 large tomato, finely chopped or ½ cup finely chopped tomatoes
1 large tomato, finely chopped or ½ cup finely chopped tomatoes
1 tsp ginger garlic paste or ½ inch ginger + 3 to 4 medium garlic, crushed to a paste in mortar-pestle
